actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning President Nixon's handling of the Middle East crisis.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that President Nixon should be commended for his handling of the Middle East crisis and that the Congress and the people should continue to support his efforts to achieve a lasting peace in the Middle East.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning President Nixon's handling of the Middle East crisis.
